review.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Aalto is a Hybrid character who has a unique playstyle","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" - he creates misty gates that empower his attacks when he shoots through them and he can also jump through the gates to turn incorporeal, increasing his movement speed. This combined with the ability to create mist clones that taunt nearby enemies, make him a trickster that is hard to catch if you know what you're doing.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The strongest part of his kit is definitely his ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Outro skill that provides the next ally with Aero DMG% Deepen","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":", making him a good partner for Jiyan and any other future Aero Main DPS. Unfortunately, to balance out this powerful and generic outro as S0 he takes up quite a bit of field time to access his concerto while also having just “ok” damage output putting him a decent bit behind other hybrid characters in 1.0.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"With just these points considered, it’s not enough for Aalto to be placed low performance-wise but what makes him rank him quite a bit lower at S0 than alternatives is his playstyle and immensely high ultimate energy cost (150). To play Aalto effectively, you must shoot through his Mist Gate and then after accumulating 6 charges, dash through it. But doing so, puts him in between the gate and the targets you were just shooting, forcing him to either reposition, create another gate with his skill (which has a long cooldown), or do a full basic string without gaining any charges. All of these options aren’t great and are needed to perform an optimal rotation making Aalto a little awkward to play at S0.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Fortunately for Aalto, he gains a lot of power, utility, and most importantly quality of life from his Sequences which will help him later on in the lifetime of players' accounts. ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"In conclusion, Aalto has some interesting utility and a good generic outro buff but falls short a bit at S0","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":".","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

pros.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Fantastic outro for buffing Aero damage dealers,","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Can execute a fast concerto rotation when cooldowns are managed effectively,","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Becomes smoother to play with more damage with higher Sequences,","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Spawns clones that taunt enemies improving endgame survivability,","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Cool Sunglasses.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

echo_sets.name: Moonlit Clouds
echo_sets.notes: Offers a 10% unconditional Energy Regen% boost taking some pressure off your gear when aiming at regen breakpoints. Also upon using Outro, grants the next character switching in a 22.5% ATK boost amplifying any of your main damage dealer's burst windows. This set sacrifices personal damage to help the team more.

buildInfoOther.substats: Energy Regeneration (Until Breakpoint) >= CRIT RATE = CRIT DMG > ATK% > Flat ATK
